ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Why did you start a Bard? [How many days have you p layed!?]
ygData.msgSnippet: depends on your playstyle too.  are you willing to sit your butt down in lower guk and never leave for 3 weeks?  or do you have the need for variety and want
ygData.messageBody:
depends on your playstyle too. are you willing to sit your butt down in lower guk and
never leave for 3 weeks? or do you have the need for variety and want to go to guk, and
then over to sol b and then over to karnors, etc.


At 07:41 PM 1/11/01 -0500, you wrote:
>well 50 shouldn't take you more than a normal week then. you shouldn't have
>a problem getting a bubble every 3 hours of play.
>
>51 and 52 should take you at least twice that, but it's hard to remember.
>
>so what's that, 2 months or so? =)
>
>Shada
>
> > Whats a conservative estimate on how long it takes to get
> > from 50 to 53
> > (three full levels)? I play on average around 10-15 hours a
> > week.
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
